mapper.select: SELECT ea.EVENT_CD AS eventCd, ea.USER_ID AS userId, wm.USER_NICKNAME AS userNickName FROM `EVENT_ATTENDENCES` ea JOIN WORKSPACE_MEMBERS wm ON ea.USER_ID = wm.USER_ID AND wm.WORKSPACE_CD = ( SELECT WORKSPACE_CD FROM `EVENTS` WHERE EVENT_CD = #{eventCd} ) WHERE ea.EVENT_CD = #{eventCd}
